Reference

Kaggle API

Directly interact with the API. For a more in-depth walkthrough visit the Kaggle API page.

Competitions

kgl_competitions_data_download()

Download competition data

kgl_competitions_data_download_all()

Download all competition data.

kgl_competitions_data_list()

Competitions Data List Files

kgl_competitions_leaderboard_download()

Competition Download Leaderboard

kgl_competitions_leaderboard_view()

Competition view leaderboard

kgl_competitions_list()

Competitions List

kgl_competitions_list_submissions()

List competition submissions

Kaggle Flow

This is an experimental and opinionated reproducible workflow for working with Kaggle competitions. For a more in-depth walkthrough visit the Kaggle Flow page.

kgl_flow()

Kaggle Flow

kgl_flow_competition_info()

Show competition info

kgl_flow_leaderboard()

Download the Competition Leaderboard

kgl_flow_load()

Loan the Kaggle data

kgl_flow_meta()

Read the project's metadata

Everything else

kgl_as_tbl()

Convert kaggle output to tibble

kgl_auth()

Kaggle API authorization

kgl_auth_file_setup()

Setup API authorization file

kgl_competition_submit()

Submit data to competition

kgl_datasets_create_new()

DatasetsCreateNew

kgl_datasets_create_version()

DatasetsCreateVersion

kgl_datasets_download()

DatasetsDownloadFile

kgl_datasets_list()

DatasetsList

kgl_datasets_upload_file()

DatasetsUploadFile

kgl_datasets_view()

Datasets View

kgl_request()

Make requests to Kaggle's API
